communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Bodycam Request – ASERET BOSCH (09/26/2023)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:
Pursuant to Chapter 119 of the Florida Statutes (Florida Public Records Law), I respectfully request access to any body-worn camera footage related to the arrest of:

- Name: ASERET BOSCH  
- Date of Birth: January 2, 1989  
- Arrest Date: September 26, 2023  
- Arresting Agency: Seminole 
- Charge: Florida Statute 827.03(2)(d)

I am specifically requesting only the raw body-worn camera footage that captures the period *immediately prior to and including the arrest itself*, limited to approximately *one hour in total*.
Please provide a cost estimate for any labor or redaction fees associated with the video footage only. I would like to be notified of any charges before processing begins.

I kindly request that the video files be delivered electronically via email or a secure downloadable link. I do not wish to receive physical media such as CDs or USBs.
This request is made for non-commercial and informational purposes only, and is not intended for resale or direct profit.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Sincerely,
Umut Ozkan
